archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.10d: d) invoking time-out facilities that automatically log off endpoint devices after a predetermined period of inactivity, clears screens and requires users to sign-on again before restoring screens.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
